casebody.data:
July 19, 1978 In re Vary Estate (Department of Treasury v Ivy). (Docket No. 57829.) Frank J. Kelley, Attorney General, Robert A. Derengoski, Solicitor General, and Richard R. Roesch and E. David Brockman, Assistants Attorney General, for plaintiff. I. Goodman Cohen for defendants.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
